1110101010001011 1110010001010111 0 -> sum: 1100111011100010, cout: 1
0011001001100111 0111011010100111 0 -> sum: 1010100100001110, cout: 0

0101100010010110 0110001001011001 1 -> sum: 1011101011110000, cout: 0
0111000001111000 1001001101011010 1 -> sum: 0000001111010011, cout: 1
